text: Heliophorus brahma, the golden sapphire, is a small butterfly found in India that belongs to the lycaenids or blues family. ==See also== *List of butterflies of India *List of butterflies of India (Lycaenidae) ==References== * * * * * * Category:Heliophorus Category:Butterflies of India Category:Butterflies described in 1857
title: Heliophorus brahma
